text: Nicholas H. Smith (born November 5, 1934) is an American politician. He was a Republican member of the United States House of Representatives from 1993 until 2005, representing from the 7th District of Michigan. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * The Political Graveyard Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Nick Smith (American politician)
